ComicInfo.Summary: With the hydroponics garden now supplying the town with fresh food, the people of Marshville begin to take pride in their ingenuity. However, they quickly learn that pride comes before a fall, as snow threatens to collapse the very roof the garden depends on for light and warmth! Meriem discovers that her home away from home is now under threat and pitches in with the others to save it, despite the cold having a horrible effect on her body!
